description:
Coastal settlement points in the BCLME (Angola, Namibia, South Africa).
Angola: Digitised from 1:25K and 1:100K topographic maps by Greenmap Consultants CC.
Namibia: Colour orthophotos Survey General, Roads Authority data, Topographic maps and Atlas of Namibia, digitized by Greenmap Consultants CC.
South Africa: Topographic maps 1:50K.
name: BCLME: Coastal settlements
